mapper.select: SELECT IMAGE_PATH_1 AS imagePath1 , IMAGE_PATH_2 AS imagePath2 , IMAGE_PATH_3 AS imagePath3 , IMAGE_PATH_4 AS imagePath4 , IMAGE_PATH_5 AS imagePath5 , IMAGE_PATH_6 AS imagePath6 , IMAGE_PATH_7 AS imagePath7 , IMAGE_PATH_8 AS imagePath8 , IMAGE_PATH_9 AS imagePath9 FROM GALLERY WHERE 1=1 AND GALLERY_NO = 1
